name: Outline background tabs - Firefox 29-56 Australis
description:
ATTENTION FIREFOX 57 USERS: Scan down to "Notes from latest update" for a new rule that might help.

ATTENTION FIREFOX 29-56 USERS WITH STYLISH 3.0.1: You can roll back to Stylish 2.1.1 here: https://addons.mozilla.org/firefox/addon/stylish/versions/.

It's difficult to spot individual tabs on the tab bar without any visual cues. This userstyle creates rounded tab outlines for improved visibility of background tabs.

discussions.name: I just installed the Stylish add on to FireFox 29 and I can't figure out how to do anything with it.
